title: Will we get compensated for mission unavailiability?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hi, I hope someone gets to read this.

Missions are temporarily down on League, as people might've noticed, which is very... disappointing. Why? Because, since the missions finish tomorrow, some, like me, might have to move quickly to complete them.

To go into more detail, I've found the proposition of three new mission lines enticing, so I've purchased the Dungeon Pass. As you might know, the Pass also gives you Daily Quests, which just give you 10 Tickets for completing a game each day. It doesn't sound like much, but I've done my math and if I get the quest tonight AND tomorrow, I'll be able to purchase one more Good Orb. Almost...

One other thing I'm missing is the 40 Tickets from the final mission of the Brand quest line. The one where you have to win a game with a Brand present. To my misfortune, I soon found out that practically nobody whom I've asked on my server (EUNE) _owns_ Brand, let alone would play him with me. I don't have him, either. So you can imagine how happy I was to see that the latest Blind pick game I've took part in turned out to have a Brand on the enemy team, and then, even moreso, we managed to win that game.

[Here](http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1784314895/37256966?tab=overview) is the link to the match record, although I am unaware if it's accessible to people signed in with different accounts. I've attached a link to the screenshot of the game from in-game Match History.

So, of course, it was an unpleasant surprise to find missions, well... _not there_. No reward. No post-game notification. No satisfaction. Naturally it irks me to think that I could lose what I've tried to fight for over the past week, and due to a Riot server issue, to boot.

So I'd like to know if the missions could be retroactively completed after they come back online, as there is only one hour left of today's Daily Quest, I have no certainty that it will even come back up before midnight, and even if it does, I just might not win my next game. It happens to everyone.

I'd also like to see if there would be any compensation for this minor inconvenience in case the quests don't become completed.

Thank you in advance for a reply.
-RexinTik

replies.body:
It looks like missions were never actually completely taken down, but I was misinformed and the server status page was updated with incorrect information. The status page currently states that there are still a few mission issues, but I've been told now that the issues are only pertaining to Ornn's mission.

If you're pretty sure that you should have already completed these missions, hit up our game team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to look over everything and set things right if needed!

It seems I lost a daily quest due to this error.

Missions where unavailable when I played to complete yesterdays daily. At 23.00 I get the new daily quest (as usual) and it says I have 24h to complete it.

Today when I log on my daily quest pops up as completed (I havent played between the new daily (23.00 yesterday) and logging on today) and there is no quest to complete for today while it said yesterday that I had untill 23.00 today to complete it.

It seems like my completion of yesterdays daily during the error completed and removed todays daily quest when the system catched up.

Turns out that the missions were, indeed, completed, once they showed up again. One could say I stressed too much for nothing, but hey... <:

Thank you for the response anyway.
